item.title: Learning Sliver C2 (08) - Implant Basics
item.description: Sliver C2 This post is part of a tutorial blog post series on Sliver C2 (v1.5.16). For an overview: click here. Introduction If you went through the previous posts, you should be familiar with the C2 protocols and be able to write a basic stager for Sliver implants that runs even if AV is on. Time to look at what you can do with a working C2 connection to a target, which is what this and the next posts will be about.
